createVideo(filename, renderers, tMin, tMax, framerate=25, resolution=None)
Create a video of a 3D visualisation.		 source code
Function Details

createVideo(filename, renderers, tMin, tMax, framerate=25, resolution=None)

source code 

Create a video of a 3D visualisation.

The video is created using the current MayaVi figure, which should be setup beforehand to correctly position the camera and any other elements that should be rendered.

Parameters:
  • filename - Name of the video file to create.
  • renderers - List of AnimatedRenderer objects to use.
  • tMin - Time from which to begin rendering.
  • tMax - Time at which to stop rendering.
  • framerate - Framerate of the video in frames per second.
  • resolution - Resolution of the video (width, height). If not specified, the resolution of the current figure is used.
